text: The 2019 Swedish Women's Curling Championship () was held in Jönköping from January 2 to 6, 2019.SM Damer, Herrar och Rullstolscurling 2019 - Svenska CurlingförbundetSwedish National Championship 2019 — Curlingzone Both 2019 Swedish Men's Curling Championship and 2019 Swedish Wheelchair Curling Championship were held simultaneously with this championship at the same arena. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable" |- !
